alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Inland; Ashtabula Lakeshore; Lake (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 18 at 4:15PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...An intense lake effect snow band will affect northeastern Lake and northern Ashtabula Counties Until 615 PM EST.... At 409 PM EST, radar indicated an intense lake effect snow band along a line extending from Perry to Conneaut. This band of snow will remain nearly stationary through the evening commute before lifting north through the remainder of the evening. HAZARDS INCLUDE... Winds to 30 mph... Visibility rapidly dropping to less than a quarter of a mile... 1 to 3 inches of quick snow accumulation... Locations impacted include... Painesville, Ashtabula, Conneaut, Fairport Harbor, Geneva-On-The-Lake, Mentor, Geneva, Madison, North Kingsville, Perry, Mentor-On-The-Lake, Austinburg, Kingsville, Pierpont, North Perry, Grand River, Edgewood, Plymouth Center, North Madison and Kelloggsville. This lake effect snow band will impact I-90 primarily east of mile marker 210. Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this lake effect snow band. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads are likely to lead to accidents. Consider delaying travel until this snow band passes your location. && ODOT DMS 326 and 332.
